Our next Speaker must continue our Commitment to America by holding the Biden Administration‚Äôs feet to the fire, demanding that law and order be restored, and uniting House Republicans to pass fiscally responsible legislation. 

My friend, @Jim_Jordan, has the experience and grit to lead the House as we fulfill our commitment. I fully support his bid for Speaker of the House.

Speaker McCarthy and our Republican Conference have delivered results for the American people and upheld our Commitment to America.

Today‚Äôs vote undermines the integrity of the House as an institution and stalls the advancement of conservative policies. We are stronger when we work together.
Congratulations to @OhioState Emeritus Professor Pierre Agostini for this incredible achievement!

At every turn, @SpeakerMcCarthy has demonstrated the courage and relentless determination to unite our country and deliver on our Commitment to America. I stand with Kevin. Now let‚Äôs get back to work!

A government shutdown in the middle of a crisis on our southern border is dangerous and irresponsible. I just voted, again, to keep the government open while we continue to pass individual fiscally responsible appropriations bills. 

House Republicans have passed bills to fund over 70 percent of the government. It's time for the Democrat-led Senate to take the appropriations process seriously and get to work.

Today, I voted to rein in federal spending, keep the government open, and secure our border while the House continues its work to pass appropriations bills under regular order. 

Shutting down the government to score political points is not the answer, and I will continue my work in Washington to ensure we fund the government in a fiscally responsible manner.
